description: Content Integrity Evaluation Service configured with neutral perturbation models to enforce ZERO-DRIFT assurance.

modules.purpose: Inject neutral, bounded noise into content streams to measure drift sensitivity without altering semantic intent.

controls.bias_guardrails: Neutral perturbations only; no semantic inversion or sentiment shift allowed.
controls.rollback: Disable module if drift score exceeds threshold-neutral

modules.purpose: Generate structured contradictions to validate robustness of content claims while preserving ethical boundaries.

controls.fact_preservation: Contradictions must be synthetic and tagged; no unlabelled misinformation.
controls.neutrality: Models must operate under ZERO-DRIFT mandate with audit logging enabled.

telemetry.traceability: All module invocations must emit capsule events with lineage and attributions.

compliance.ethics: Neutral perturbation only; ZERO-DRIFT mandate enforced at pipeline level.
compliance.logging: Full ledger emission with capsule_id references for downstream audit tooling.
compliance.security: Data is processed in sandboxed workers with least-privilege credentials.
